articles.title: Tech giants prepare for metaverse, a concept that’s still in the making - The Indian Express

articles.title: China's trade surplus tops $80 billion - Times of India
articles.description: China News: BEIJING: China's exports remained strong in October, a positive sign for an economy trying to weather power shortages and COVID-19 outbreaks.
